data.message: Facebook Facebook Business is least bothered about business pages i have my companies authentic page and i have all the relevant documents that proofs its a registered trademark brand entity. But recently people are making fake pages and misusing my brand name, Facebook is least bothered and cannot help me verify my page. I cant see page verification options in setting is there any support email or so to contact you guys to stop violation of my brand name

replies.message:
Thanks for reaching out to us, Muhammad. If the option to submit a Page verification request is not currently available to you, there are other ways to let your audience know your Page is authentic. You can link to your Page from your official website or complete the About section of your Page to provide more information.  
If you come across a Page that violates our Terms, please report it. To submit a report, go to the Page you want to report and click the drop-down below the Page's cover. Then select Report Page and follow the on-screen directions to file a report. -Joe
